div1.l: Alle halewene da&ydot; we holdez&punctelev;one time in þe &yogh;ere
for manie enchesones holie churche&punctelev; þare to u&slong; gan lere
On i&slong; for þe grete noumbre&punctelev; þat of alle halewe is
Þat euerech ne mai nou&yogh;t at i&slong; fe&slong;te&punctelev;ane da&ydot; habbe i wis
An oþur is þat we beoth feble&punctelev; þat we ne mouwen nou&yogh;t alle
Þe fe&slong;tene bi heom &slong;ulf holde&punctelev;a&slong;e hu&ydot; in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
Þe þridde anche&slong;on is for þe &yogh;er is &slong;chort&punctelev; a&slong;e ech ne ma&ydot; nou&yogh;th allone
Þe fe&slong;te habbe in þe &yogh;ere&punctelev; þare hu&ydot; habbez i mone.
Þe feorþe enche&slong;un i&slong; i wi&slong;&punctelev;for guod ri&yogh;ht it is with alle
Þat we of heom maken fe&slong;te&punctelev; &yogh;wane þe time doth falle
For gret fe&slong;te hu&ydot; makiez in heouene&punctelev; and in grete Io&ydot;e beoth
&YOGH;wan hu&ydot; an&ydot; amendement&punctelev;of us on vrþe i&slong;eoth

l.hi: For þe guod &slong;pel &slong;eith of swich gret Io&ydot;e&punctelev;þat a mong heom in heouene is
&YOGH;wane ani of u&slong; a mendi wole&punctelev;of þat we doth a mis
Þe fifte enche&slong;un is for þare wa&slong;&punctelev;a forbu&ydot;&slong;ne þar of bi gonne
Longue are þe &slong;trencþe of cristinedomsquigly&punctelev;on vrþe were i wonne
For þe he&ydot;&yogh;e ma&ydot;&slong;tres of sare&slong;ins&punctelev;þat on vrþe weren þo here
Maden ech maumat bi heom &slong;ulf&punctelev;at rome on Auter
Ac natheles of eche ne mi&yogh;hte he nou&yoght;t&punctelev;for here gode&slong; &slong;o fale were
And hu&ydot; nolden nou&yogh;th þat ani god were&punctelev;with oute honour þere
Þare fore hu&ydot; maden on Auter&punctelev;commu&ydot;n to ech one
For to honouri alle heore gode&slong; þare&punctelev;a&slong;e it were al i mone
And &slong;ethþe þo cristinedom squigly cam&punctelev;and &slong;w&ydot;þe wide &slong;pradde
At rome and eke elles &yogh;ware&punctelev;clanliche þe ma&ydot;&slong;trie hadde
Bonefas þe guode pope&punctelev;to þe fal&slong;e Autere&slong; cam
And of þe Autere of alle godes&punctelev;grete &yogh;eme he nam
In forebu&ydot;&slong;ne þar of&punctelev;ane churche he liet a rere
Of ore lauedi and of alle haluwene&punctelev;in þulke place þere
Ake six hundret &yogh;er and fiue&punctelev;ore louerd bi fore
Of marie is &slong;uete moder&punctelev;on vrþe wa&slong; i bore
Þe churche þat of ore lauedi wa&slong;&punctelev;and of alle halewene þo bi founde
Stant &yogh;eot at rome and is i cleped&punctelev;Marie la rounde
Þe pope al&slong;o Bonefaz&punctelev;ane day in þe &yogh;ere
In þe honour of alle halewene&punctelev;he liet halewi þere
And hiet al&slong;o þoru&yogh;h al cristinedomsquigly &punctelev;halewi þilke da&ydot;
Ake þulke t&ydot;me he wa&slong; i holde&punctelev;þe endlefte dai of ma&ydot;
Ake þe pope Gregori&punctelev;þat þare aftur longue cam
I&slong;a&ydot;&yogh; þat þe da&ydot; to halewi wa&slong;&punctelev;ope al cristindom squigly
And þat ri&yogh;ht wa&slong; þat ech man&punctelev;þe hexte and le&slong;te
In þe honour of alle haluwene&punctelev;made þane da&ydot; fe&slong;te
And in a &slong;kars t&ydot;me of þe &yogh;ere&punctelev;a&slong;e we w&ydot;ten it wa&slong; in Ma&ydot;
So gret fe&slong;te forto holde&punctelev;a&slong;e ful to þad da&ydot;
Þare fore he liet þane da&ydot; tu&ydot;rne&punctelev;a&slong;e we him holdez &yogh;u&ydot;te
In þe fur&slong;te dai of nouembre&punctelev;&yogh;wane ech guod ni&slong; nouh&yogh;t &slong;o lu&ydot;te
Me þinchez &yogh;u&ydot;t quath þe guode man&punctelev;"þe fe&slong;te feble were
bote Men hadden &yogh;ware with&punctelev;þe wombe Io&ydot;e a rere
Þe fur&slong;te &yogh;er þare afturward&punctelev;þat men þane da&ydot; þu&slong; nome
Of a fair cas ich ma&ydot; telle&punctelev;þat bi feol in þe churche of rome
Þe wardein of seint petere&slong; church&punctelev;þat &yogh;u&ydot;t in rome is
Þe fe&slong;te honourede &slong;w&ydot;þe muche&punctelev;of alle halewene i wi&slong;
on alle halewene da&ydot; in churche&punctelev;to ech auter he gan gon
And honourede ech aftur oþur&punctelev;he ne liet nou&yogh;ht on
To þe hei&yogh;e auter of seint petre&punctelev;ate la&slong;te he wende
And þare he la&ydot; a doun an &slong;lep&punctelev;a&slong;e god him grce&slong;ende character search
him þou&yogh;te þare cam an Aungel&punctelev;and ladde him to heouene on hei&yogh;h
In a cha&ydot;ere with gret Io&ydot;e&punctelev;ore louerd him þou&yogh;hte he &slong;ei&yogh;h
with grete hei&yogh;hne&slong;&slong;e &slong;itte&punctelev;and Aungles him al a boute
Þo cam þare a fair leuedi&punctelev;with Ma&ydot;denes a gret route
Þat wa&slong; ore lauedi with virgine&slong;&punctelev;and ore louerd faire heo grette
Ore louerd a &yogh;ein hire a ros&punctelev;and bi him fa&ydot;re hire &slong;ette
Þo cam þare a Man in o sclaue&ydot;n&punctelev;a&slong;e hit of a Cama&ydot;le were
And olde hore Men aftur him&punctelev;and honoureden god þere
Þat was seint Iohan þe bapti&slong;t&punctelev;and þe profete&slong; olde
And al&slong;o þe patriarke&slong;&punctelev;þat of ore louerd &yogh;w&ydot;lene tolde
Þo comen þare twelue in one route&punctelev;a&slong;e bi&slong;chope&slong; it weren ech one
Þe fur&slong;te a&slong;e hu&ydot: pope&slong; weren&punctelev;bi fore he &yogh;eode al one
Þat wa&slong; seint petre&punctelev;and his felawe&slong; endleuene
Alle hu&ydot; honourede ore louerd&punctelev;þare he &slong;at in heouene
Þo comen þare a&slong;e hit kn&ydot;&yogh;htes weren&punctelev;redie for to fi&yogh;hte
Al blodie for to defendi ore louerd&punctelev;and holie churche ri&yogh;hte
Þat weren Mart&ydot;s þat for god&punctelev;and holie churche al&slong;o
&YOGH;euen heore lif a&slong;e gode&slong; kn&ydot;&yogh;hte&slong;&punctelev;and to deþe weren ido
Þo cam þare a gret compa&ydot;gnie&punctelev;preo&slong;te&;slong a&slong;e þei it were
Þat weren þe confe&slong;&slong;ours&punctelev;þat hadden holie churche to lere
A&slong;e bi&slong;chopes and Abbodes&punctelev;and oþur guode men al&slong;o
Ore louerd hu&ydot; honoureden alle&punctelev;a&slong;e heore ri&yogh;hte wa&slong; to do
Of fe&slong;te þat Men on vrþe maden&punctelev;hu&ydot; þonkeden him and bade
For alle þat a ri&yogh;ht heore da&ydot; heolden&punctelev;and fe&slong;te of heom made
Þo goune hu&ydot; &slong;ingue heore Matine&slong;&punctelev;swyþ murie with alle
For alle þat honouriez heore da&ydot: here&punctelev;a&slong;e heo in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
wel ou&yogh;hte we þane da&ydot; honouren&punctelev;&yogh;wane hu&ydot; þat ilke da&ydot;
Swuch Io&ydot;e for u&slong; in heouene maden&punctelev;a&slong;e þe guode Man i&slong;a&ydot;
Nou bidde alle halewene&punctelev;þat we heore fe&slong;te holden so
Þat hu&ydot; u&slong; bringuen to þe he&ydot;&yogh;e Io&ydot;e&punctelev;þare hu&ydot; buth inne i do
